entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
